name: react-redux-data-grid
description: A data grid solution in React and Redux

scripts.test: env NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:$PWD/src ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register --reporter spec src/*.spec.js src/**/*.spec.js --require mocha.config
